net.sf.gogui.game
Class NodeUtil

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.gogui.game.NodeUtil

public final class NodeUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility functions operating on a tree of nodes.

Method Detail

backward

public static ConstNode backward(ConstNode node,
                                 int n)
Get node reached by going a number of nodes backward.

Parameters:
node - The start node.
n - The number of moves to go backward.
Returns:
The node reached by going n moves backward or the root node of the tree, if there are less than n nodes in the sequence before the start node.

cleanSgfProps

public static SgfProperties cleanSgfProps(ConstNode node)
Remove SGF properties for information already contained in game info. This can be used for example, if a SGF reader cannot handle an unknown format of the TM property, puts it into the SGF properties of the node to preserve the information for future saving, but later a well-defined time settings was set in the game information of the node. Handles the following properties: TM (because FF3 allowed an arbitrary text in TM), OT (FF4 allows arbitrary text)

Returns:
The cleaned properties, empty properties, if node.getSgfProperties() was null

commentContains

public static boolean commentContains(ConstNode node,
                                      java.util.regex.Pattern pattern)
Check if the comment of the current node contains a pattern.

Parameters:
node - The node to check.
pattern - The pattern.
Returns:
true, if the current node has a comment and a match for the pattern is found in the comment.

findByMoveNumber

public static ConstNode findByMoveNumber(ConstNode node,
                                         int moveNumber)
Find first node with a certain move number in main variation of a given node.

Parameters:
node - The given node.
moveNumber - The move number of the wanted node.
Returns:
The node with the given move number or null if no such node exists.

findByVariation

public static ConstNode findByVariation(ConstNode root,
                                        java.lang.String variation)
Get first node of a given variation. Searches the node that can be reached from the root node by taking the children defined by the integers in the variation string for nodes with more than one child.

Parameters:
root - The root node of the tree.
variation - The variation string (e.g. "1.1.3.1.5").
Returns:
The first node of the given variation, or the root node, if the variation string is empty, or null, if the variation string is invalid or does not specify a node in the given tree.

findInComments

public static ConstNode findInComments(ConstNode node,
                                       java.util.regex.Pattern pattern)
Find next node with a comment containing a pattern in the iteration through complete tree.

Parameters:
node - The current node in the iteration.
pattern - The pattern.
Returns:
The next node in the iteration through the complete tree after the current node that contains a match of the pattern.

findNextComment

public static ConstNode findNextComment(ConstNode node)
Find next node with a comment in the iteration through complete tree.

Parameters:
node - The current node in the iteration.
Returns:
The next node in the iteration through the complete tree after the current node that has a comment.

forward

public static ConstNode forward(ConstNode node,
                                int n)
Get node reached by going a number of nodes forward.

Parameters:
node - The start node.
n - The number of moves to go forward.
Returns:
The node reached by going n moves forward following the main variaton (always the first child) or the last node in this variation, if it has less than n nodes.

getBackToMainVariation

public static ConstNode getBackToMainVariation(ConstNode node)
Find the last node that was still in the main variation.

getChildrenMoves

public static PointList getChildrenMoves(ConstNode node)
Get all children moves.

Returns:
Point list containing the move points, not including passes and independent of color.

getChildWithMove

public static ConstNode getChildWithMove(ConstNode node,
                                         Move move)
Get child node containing a certain move.

Returns:
null if no such child exists.

getCommentStart

public static java.lang.String getCommentStart(ConstNode node,
                                               boolean firstLineOnly,
                                               int maxChar)
Get comment, but no more than a maximum number of characters.

Returns:
Start of comment, with ellipses appended if trunceted; null, if node has no comment.

getDepth

public static int getDepth(ConstNode node)
Get depth of a node.

Parameters:
node - The node.
Returns:
The number of nodes in the sequence from the root node to the given node, excluding the given node (which means that the root node has depth 0).

getLast

public static ConstNode getLast(ConstNode node)
Get last node in main variation.

getMoveNumber

public static int getMoveNumber(ConstNode node)
Get the move number of a node.

Parameters:
node - The node.
Returns:
The total number of moves in the sequence of nodes from the root node to the given node, including the given node.

Nodes left in main variation.

getPathToRoot

public static void getPathToRoot(ConstNode node,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<ConstNode> result)
Get nodes in path from a given node to the root node.

Parameters:
node - The node
result - The resulting path. Passed as an argument to allow reusing an array list. It will be cleared before it is used.

getPreviousVariation

public static ConstNode getPreviousVariation(ConstNode node)
Return previous variation of this node.

getPreviousEarlierVariation

public static ConstNode getPreviousEarlierVariation(ConstNode node)
Return previous variation before this node.

getRoot

public static ConstNode getRoot(ConstNode node)
Get the root node.

Parameters:
node - The node.
Returns:
The root node of the tree that the given node belongs to.

getVariationString

public static java.lang.String getVariationString(ConstNode node)
Get a text representation of the variation to a certain node. The string contains the number of the child for each node with more than one child in the path from the root node to this node. The childs are counted starting with 1 and the numbers are separated by colons.

hasSiblingMoves

public static boolean hasSiblingMoves(ConstNode node)
Check if a node contains a move and has sibling nodes containing other moves.

hasSubtree

public static boolean hasSubtree(ConstNode node)
Subtree of node contains at least one node with 2 or more children.

isInCleanup

public static boolean isInCleanup(ConstNode node)
Check if game is in cleanup stage. Cleanup stage is after two consecutive pass moves have been played.

isInMainVariation

public static boolean isInMainVariation(ConstNode node)
Check if a node is in the main variation of the tree.

Parameters:
node - The node.
Returns:
true, if the given node is in the main variation, which is the sequence of nodes starting from the root of the tree and always following the first child.

isRootWithoutChildren

public static boolean isRootWithoutChildren(ConstNode node)
Check if node is root node and has no children.

Parameters:
node - The node to check.
Returns:
true, if the node has no father node and no children.

isTimeLeftKnown

public static boolean isTimeLeftKnown(ConstNode node,
                                      GoColor color)
Check that the time left for a color at a node is known. Returns true, if the last node (including the given one) containing a move of the given color also contains information about the time left after the move for the color. If a previous node with a game info containing time settings exists and no move of the given color was played since then, the function also returns true.

makeMainVariation

public static void makeMainVariation(Node node)
Make the variation of the current node to be the main variation of the tree. Changes the children order of all nodes in the sequence from the root node to the current node (exclusive the current node), such that all nodes in the sequence (inclusive the current node) are the first child of their parents.

Parameters:
node - The current node.

makeTreeFromPosition

public static GameTree makeTreeFromPosition(ConstGameInfo info,
                                            ConstBoard board)
Create a game tree with the current board position as setup stones.

nextNode

public static ConstNode nextNode(ConstNode node)
Get next node for iteration through complete tree.

nextNode

public static ConstNode nextNode(ConstNode node,
                                 int depth)
Get next node for iteration through subtree.

nodeInfo

public static java.lang.String nodeInfo(ConstNode node)
Return a string containing information about a node. The string contains a listing of the data stored in the node (like moves or setup stones) and properties of the node in the tree (like depth or variation).

restoreClock

public static void restoreClock(ConstNode node,
                                Clock clock)
Restore the clock to the state corresponding to a node. Updates the clock from the time left information stored in the nodes of the sequence from the root node to the current node.

Parameters:
node - The current node.
clock - The clock to update.

selectRandom

public static ConstNode selectRandom(ConstNode root,
                                     int minDepth,
                                     int maxDepth)
Select a random node in the main variation within a certain depth interval.

Parameters:
root - The root node
minDepth - The minimum depth of the interval (inclusive)
maxDepth - The maximum depth of the interval (inclusive)
Returns:
A random node in the given depth interval, null, if there is none.

subtreeGreaterThan

public static boolean subtreeGreaterThan(ConstNode node,
                                         int size)
Check if the number of nodes in the subtree of a node is greater than a given limit.

subtreeSize

public static int subtreeSize(ConstNode node)
Count number of nodes in subtree.

Parameters:
node - The root node of the subtree.
Returns:
The number of nodes in the subtree (including the root node).

treeInfo

public static java.lang.String treeInfo(ConstNode node)
Return a string containing information and statistics of the subtree of a node.

truncateChildren

public static void truncateChildren(Node node)
Remove all children.
